titles.title: Mescalero Apache Tribe Leasing Authorization Act
A bill to authorize the Mescalero Apache Tribe to lease adjudicated water rights.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S202)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.

bill.summary: 1/25/2011--Introduced. Mescalero Apache Tribe Leasing Authorization Act - Authorizes the Mescalero Apache Tribe to lease or transfer certain of their water rights for a term of up to 99 years, provided the lease or transfer complies with the laws of New Mexico.
